issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings in Filesystems (Interface)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15430](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15430). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ensure docstrings for Filesystem Interface have an `Examples` section:
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.FileInfo.html#pyarrow.fs.FileInfo>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.FileSelector.html#pyarrow.fs.FileSelector>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.fs.FileSystem.html#pyarrow.fs.FileSystem>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15430?focusedCommentId=17569479) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
